1604065905_mirrored_amuuza_github.body:
To note, this does work when using Dat and Beaker Browser as a decentralized web solution.

- https://beakerbrowser.com
- https://datproject.org
- experimental dat web browser for Android https://github.com/bunsenbrowser/bunsen

topic.title: Can peers connect offline on Wifi?
topic.body: Hi folks - What beautiful project! I love the authorization for multi-key signatures. Can peers discover each other and transfer zites offline though? And if not, what are the missing pieces?
